C1 56 //XMIT 'h56 -> R1
C2 05 //XMIT 'h05 -> R2
02 0F //MOVE R2 -> RB Address
01 1F //MOVE R1 -> RB
C1 00 //XMIT 'h00 -> R1
C0 03 //XMIT 'h03 -> AUX
3F 03 //ADD AUX,RB -> R3
C2 00 //XMIT 'h00 -> R2
02 07 //MOVE R2 -> LB Address
03 17 //MOVE R3 -> LB

00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00
